item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, October 27, 2024 at 7:15 PM UTC
item.description:

10. Hyperbound (YC S23) is hiring a 4th founding full-stack engineer ( | hide)

26. Highest-Voltage Electron Gun (25 points | 28 comments)
27. Show HN: Ezcrypt – A file encryption tool (simple, strong, public domain) (11 points | 7 comments)
28. In some scientific papers, words expressing uncertainty have decreased (2023) (9 points | 1 comment)
29. I discovered mysterious hidden signals on a public radio channel (2013) [video] (231 points | 59 comments)
30. Typeset: An HTML pre-proces­sor for web ty­pog­ra­phy (108 points | 49 comments)
